refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: kadelnode unregisters nodes and their disk and partition features from the deployment system.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: -m, --machine hostname specifies a host. This option can be used more than once to specify several hosts

refsect1.title: EXAMPLE
refsect1.para: kadelnode -m node1 remove all information relative to node1 from the deployment system database
